mapper.sql: id, sportid, sportname, campus, classes, profession, currentime
mapper.select: select count(1) from team_table where sportid=#{sportid} and profession=#{profession} and currentime=#{currentime}
select * from team_table where currentime=#{currentime} limit #{tempPage},#{pageCapacity};
select count(1) from team_table where currentime=#{currentime}
mapper.insert: insert into team_table (id, sportid, sportname, campus, classes, profession, currentime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sportname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{campus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
